identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a high-density, professional dispatch interface that balances functional utility with aesthetic precision.
principles: Density with Clarity: High information density without visual clutter.
Contextual Grouping: Logical flow from Left (Input) to Right (Confirmation).
Visual Anchors: Use color and icons to guide the eye through the booking flow.
Status Visibility: Immediate recognition of booking state via color-coded strips.

primary.description: Deep Navy Blue - Core Brand Color

accent.description: Gold - For premium actions and highlights

body.usage: Form labels, Input text, Data display

layout.grid_system: grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-12 gap-4 p-4 h-[calc(100vh-64px)] overflow-hidden

left.content: Primary Input Form (Who, Where, When, What)

center.content: Context & Extras (Passenger Info, Notes, Payment, Tags)

section_container.base: bg-white rounded-lg border border-border shadow-sm overflow-hidden
section_container.header: flex items-center gap-2 px-4 py-3 bg-slate-50/50 border-b border-border

form_elements.input: h-9 bg-white border-input focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary transition-all
form_elements.label: text-xs font-medium text-muted-foreground mb-1.5 block

badges.notification: inline-flex items-center gap-1.5 px-2.5 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-medium transition-colors cursor-pointer border

map_card.container: h-full min-h-[300px] bg-slate-100 rounded-lg relative overflow-hidden border border-border
map_card.overlay_card: absolute bottom-4 left-4 right-4 bg-white/90 backdrop-blur-md p-3 rounded-lg shadow-lg border border-white/20

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid colors or subtle patterns.
Ensure all form inputs have a consistent height (h-9) for alignment.
Use 'Manrope' for all section headers to maintain brand consistency.
Map container must take up the remaining height of the right column.
Action buttons (Save, Reset) should be placed in a fixed footer or at the bottom of the Right column.
instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'NewBookingPage' component using the 3-column layout defined above. Reuse existing logic from 'BookingsPage.jsx' for data fetching and state management. Focus on the UI transformation to match the 'Cab9 Dispatch' density and professional look. Use the 'section_container' style for all major groups.
